name: UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment
desc: Specifies how to align a buttonâ€™s title and subtitle.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Aligns the title and subtitle based on other elements in the button configuration, like an image or activity indicator.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Aligns the title and subtitle on their horizontal centers.

items.name: case leading
items.desc: Aligns the title and subtitle on their leading edges.

items.name: case trailing
items.desc: Aligns the title and subtitle on their trailing edges.

items.name: static func == (UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment, UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two title alignments are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment, UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two title alignments are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the title alignment by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the title alignment.
